short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select an area to show a box over it. Click to remove it, hold 'ctrl' to remove all. Can be used to hide ads or anything else

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- It's used like a screenshot tool, but instead of taking a screenshot it displays a box over the selected area. It's an intuitive and easy to use single click extension.

- Click it once to remove it, or hold 'ctrl' and click to remove all boxes.

- It uses the background color of the element it blocks, so with the right selection, integration is seamless.

- You can choose between fixed or absolute position (box moves with scroll or not) as well as colors in the settings pane.

- Everything runs locally and it doesn't connect to a server or collect data.

- Limitation: selection must start within body element
